tool_description: Optimizes portfolio allocations using various optimization techniques while respecting constraints and objectives.

objective_function.description: Optimization objective: max_sharpe, min_variance, max_return, risk_parity, black_litterman

weight_bounds.description: Min and max weight bounds alternating [min1, max1, min2, max2, ...]

current_weights.description: Current portfolio weights for turnover minimization

error_messages: Invalid objective: Must be one of [max_sharpe, min_variance, max_return, risk_parity, black_litterman].
Array dimension mismatch: All input arrays must have consistent dimensions.
Invalid covariance matrix: Matrix must be positive semi-definite.
Invalid weight bounds: Bounds must be between 0 and 1, with min <= max for each asset.
Optimization failed: No feasible solution found with given constraints.
Invalid risk aversion: Must be between 0 and 10.
usage: Provide objective_function, asset_symbols, expected_returns, and covariance_matrix. Use optional parameters to add constraints and customize optimization.
